Usoro Haber,  nke a na-akpọkwa usoro Haber-Bosch, bụ usoro nhazi nitrogen artificial na bụ isi usoro mmepụta ihe maka mmepụta nke amonia taa. Akpọrọ ya aha ndị mepụtara ya, ndị German chemists Fritz Haber na Carl Bosch, bụ ndị mepụtara ya n'afọ iri mbụ nke narị afọ nke 20
Usoro a na-atụgharị nitrogen ikuku (N2) ka ọ bụrụ amonia (NH3) site na mmeghachi omume na hydrogen (H2) site na iji metal catalyst n'okpuru nnukwu okpomọkụ na nrụgide:
